name: Wave Swarm - GGJ2017 UCL
description:
The web version is in 480p with medium quality, if you want to enjoy the game at full 1080p and full graphics you can download it and install in your desktop.

This game was made in the UCL university from Manguinhos, ES - Brazil during the Global Jam 2017 event.

Jam link: Wave Swarm - GGJ UCL

The theme of the Jam was Waves, and the team resposible for developing this game though in the idea of doing a game where the player have to reach the Goddess Iemanjá while jumping over a few waves in order to offer her an present in order to stop the waves.

The Player must press space in order to jump.

Developers:

João Ozires de Souza Dalvi - Programmer and Designer and Animator: Itch Link

Luiz Fernando Rinoso - 3d Modeler, Designer and texture artist: Itch Link

Geraldo Pereira - FX Sounds and Music;

Renan da Silva Duarte - Programmer and Designer;

Éder Ferreira Silva - Designer;
